title: White chocolate mousse torte
ingredients: ['Base', '50g dark brown soft sugar', '50g plain flour', '50g hazelnuts', '50g butter', 'Filling', '350g best quality white chocolate, chopped', '350g Greek yoghurt', '1 leaf gelatine, soaked in a few tablespoons of cold water', '350ml whipping cream, whipped', '1 (340g) jar morello cherry conserve']
